Przygotowanie danych
```{r}
setwd("D:/PW-MAGISTERSKIE/PW-Magisterskie-sem2/ZUM/Projekt/ZUM_Proj")
df <- read.csv(
  file = 'Data/winemag-data-130k-v2.csv',
  sep = ','
)

df2 <- df[,colSums(is.na(df["description"]))<nrow(df)]
df2[["description"]] <- tolower(df2[["description"]])

library(stringr)
df2[["description"]] <-str_replace(gsub("([^a-z'])", " ", df2[["description"]]), "B", "b") 
df2[["description"]] <-str_replace(gsub("\\s+", " ", df2[["description"]]), "B", "b") 
df2[["description"]] <-str_replace(gsub("\\s$", "", df2[["description"]]), "B", "b")
```

Klasy ze wsględu na points
```{r}
dyskretyzacja <- function(x) {
  if(x<82) {
    1
  }
  else if(x<84) {
    2
  }
  else if(x<86) {
    3
  }
  else if(x<88) {
    4
  }
  else{
    5
  }
}

df2$points<-apply(array(df2[["points"]]),MARGIN=1, FUN=dyskretyzacja)
```

Robienie słownika z wykorzystaniem tokenóW (bardziej użyteczne, tokeny są spoko- matrix w kolumnie 'value' ma listę słóW)

```{r}
library(text2vec)
tok_fun = word_tokenizer
train_tokens = tok_fun(train$description)


it_train = itoken(train_tokens,
                  ids = train$X,
                  # turn off progressbar because it won't look nice in rmd
                  progressbar = FALSE)


vocab = create_vocabulary(it_train)
vocab[order(-vocab$doc_count),]
```
 
TF-IDF (Advanced Bag of Words)

```{r}
  pruned_vocab = prune_vocabulary(vocab,
                                  term_count_min = 10000,
                                  doc_proportion_max = 0.5,
                                  doc_proportion_min = 0.1)
  vectorizer = vocab_vectorizer(pruned_vocab)
   dtm_train = create_dtm(it_train, vectorizer)
```

```{r}
library(text2vec)
library(caret)
ctrl.svm.1 <- trainControl(method="repeatedcv",
                           number=10,
                           repeats=5,
                           summaryFunction = multiClassSummary,
                           verboseIter = TRUE)
fit.svm.1 <- train(x = dtm_train_tfidf_matrix, y= as.factor(train$points), 
                   method="svmLinear2",  
                   metric="Accuracy", 
                   trControl = ctrl.svm.1, 
                   scale = FALSE, verbose = TRUE)
```
